'''Brian''' is a kid who was stuck in a building after it caught fire.

==History==
Brian was asleep when the building he was squatting in caught on fire. By the time he was awakened, the building was engulfed in flames and he was having trouble breathing. He was trapped in the building along with the rest of a group of kids who were all sleeping there. He was found by the firefighters, but remained trapped when the sprinklers were turned on, but contained an accelerant instead of water. When access to water finally came through, Brian was rescued along with the others and was then treated for smoke inhalation.

==Relationships==
===Friendships===
Brian, [[Tori (Lost and Found)|Tori]], [[Sean (Lost and Found)|Sean]], and [[Zoe]] became close as they all squatted in a building together while experiencing homelessness. Zoe was upset to know that the police would separate them after the fire.
